title: Evaluation of surface water contamination and its impacts on health in the mining districts of Kambélé and Bétaré-Oya (Eastern-Cameroon)
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Ngoa Manga Elisabeth Sylvie, Armel Zacharie Ekoa Bessa, Rigobert-Espoir Ayissi Mbomo, Jean Victor Akono, Bachirou Dairou, Kamtchouing Pierre
